document_data.name: Bexron
document_data.History: As of [[1491 DR]], Bexron and two [[bar-lgura]] watched the entrance to the [[Undying Temple]] but in truth they relaxed with a good smoke and boasted to each other.{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|37}}
document_data.Personality: Bexron was a ferocious demon but the madness spread by [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]] had changed him into a lazy and somewhat friendly creature. Bexron now looked for new experiences to luxuriate in.
